name: bnj157
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))))

stmt.origin: mpan(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1), wfr(c1, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wfr(c1, c0)
-| wi(wa(wfr(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wfr(c1, c0)
-| wi(wa(wfr(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wfr(c1, c0), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wb(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wfr(c1, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wb(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

comment: Well-founded induction restricted to a set ( ` A e. _V ` ). The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory. See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
